about_the_game:
Hamster Clicker!

Welcome to the world of Hamster Clicker — a fun and engaging clicker that will steal your heart! Help the adorable hamster girl collect coins and unlock new outfits in this dynamic adventure!

Story

In a faraway magical forest, there lives a hamster girl who dreams of becoming the happiest and most successful in her world. Together with you, she will collect coins and acquire new outfits, becoming more beautiful with each step. Help her on this incredible journey and become a true clicker master!

COLLECT YOUR COLLECTION OF HAMSTERS!

Game Features:

  • Intuitive gameplay: Easy to learn, hard to put down! Simply tap the screen to collect coins and help your hamster girl grow.

  • Upgrade system: Unlock new outfits and items for your character as you progress through levels.

  • Colorful graphics and animation: Enjoy high-quality animation and charming character design.

  • Simple yet engaging progression: Pass through numerous levels, each offering new outfits and items for your hamster girl.

  • Compete with friends: Surpass your friends and players worldwide by climbing to the top of the global leaderboard.

  • Shop: Purchase various items in the shop to make your hamster girl even more attractive.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

name: Hamster Clicker!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 / 8.1 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 Ti or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
